altername_name: ZaciSa: Defense of the Crayon Dimensions!
name: ZaciSa's Last Stand
overview: ZaciSa: Defense of the Crayon Dimensions! is a simple, yet challenging, 2D tower defense game set in space. Build different bot weapons and defend your base from an evil space empire that wants to destroy the Crayon Empire at all costs! Earn money by defeating enemies as they try to destroy you and build better, smarter weapons to defend yourself. Can you survive the onslaught? Playable in four challenging game modes: Easy, Hard, Insanity, and Endurance Protect your base in over 10 unique maps Co-op support lets players work together to protect the Crayon Empire Online and local leaderboard support
